tool.name: SAGA.ta_morphometry.24
tool.description: Valley and Ridge Detection (Top Hat Approach)
tool.command: $__tool_directory__/Code/openapi.py isArrayDEM False output_data_VALLEY $output_data_VALLEY output_data_HILL $output_data_HILL output_data_VALLEY_IDX $output_data_VALLEY_IDX output_data_HILL_IDX $output_data_HILL_IDX output_data_SLOPE_IDX $output_data_SLOPE_IDX name SAGA.ta_morphometry.24 DEM $DEM RADIUS_VALLEY $RADIUS_VALLEY RADIUS_HILL $RADIUS_HILL THRESHOLD $THRESHOLD METHOD $METHOD prefer $prefer response $response outputType_VALLEY $OutputSection_VALLEY.outputType_VALLEY transmissionMode_VALLEY $OutputSection_VALLEY.transmissionMode_VALLEY outputType_HILL $OutputSection_HILL.outputType_HILL transmissionMode_HILL $OutputSection_HILL.transmissionMode_HILL outputType_VALLEY_IDX $OutputSection_VALLEY_IDX.outputType_VALLEY_IDX transmissionMode_VALLEY_IDX $OutputSection_VALLEY_IDX.transmissionMode_VALLEY_IDX outputType_HILL_IDX $OutputSection_HILL_IDX.outputType_HILL_IDX transmissionMode_HILL_IDX $OutputSection_HILL_IDX.transmissionMode_HILL_IDX outputType_SLOPE_IDX $OutputSection_SLOPE_IDX.outputType_SLOPE_IDX transmissionMode_SLOPE_IDX $OutputSection_SLOPE_IDX.transmissionMode_SLOPE_IDX

param.name: DEM
param.label: Elevation
param.help: Elevation The following data types are allowed in the txt file: tiff, x-ogc-envi, png, x-ogc-aaigrid

param.name: RADIUS_VALLEY
param.label: Valley Radius
param.help: radius given in map units used to fill valleys

param.name: RADIUS_HILL
param.label: Hill Radius
param.help: radius given in map units used to cut hills

param.name: THRESHOLD
param.label: Elevation Threshold
param.help: elevation threshold used to identify hills/valleys

param.name: response
param.label: Response Type
param.help: Choose 'raw' for raw data or 'document' for document data.

Based on the AML script 'tophat' by Jochen Schmidt, Landcare Research. <br/><br/>References:<br/>Rodriguez, F., Maire, E., Courjault-Rad'e, P., Darrozes, J.
